divs: Sighting DetailsDuring the Perseid meteor shower i was on my lunch break in a dark area near my job watching the meteor shower. When i was steering at a bright light which according to google sky was jupiter when i notice a light which actually looked like a star was moving north.. at 1st i thought it was a plane but there werre no blinking lights so i watched it pass by the bright light (jupiter) it didn't pass in front and as it passed by more stars it was as if it was cloaked because the stars it passed by didnt blink out. I watched it for about 5min till i went out of sight
Summary: saw it during Perseid meteor shower
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around August 11th 2011
